column1: '''Ferumbras Took III''' was the thirtieth [[Thain]] of [[the Shire]].
Ferumbras was the son of [[Thain]] [[Fortinbras Took II
column2: Fortinbras II]] and [[Lalia Clayhanger]]. As Lalia outlived her husband, in accordance with [[Took Family
column3: Took]] tradition she continued as matriarch of the family, and despite Ferumbras being Thain he was only accorded a small bachelor pad in [[Great Smials]]. He remained unmarried, and according to legend it was because no woman could stand living in with Lalia.<ref name="L214">{{L

column4: Took}}</ref> As Ferumbras left no heir the Thainship passed to his second cousin, [[Paladin Took II]].<ref name="L214"/>

column2: Ferumbras]] is a name from the [[wikipedia:Roland
column3: legends of Roland]], a corruption of Frankish ''fier Ã  bras'', "brave arm".
